fields.Name: Google Custom Search
fields.Description: Performs web search using Google's Custom Search JSON API with advanced filtering and structured results. Provides high-quality search results with support for site filtering, date restrictions, file type filtering, and more.

fields.Name: Query
fields.Description: Search query text (required). The terms to search for.

fields.Name: MaxResults
fields.Description: Maximum number of results to return (1-10). Default: 10.

fields.Name: StartIndex
fields.Description: Index of the first result to return (1-91). Google limits access to first 100 results. Default: 1.

fields.Name: SafeSearch
fields.Description: Safe search filtering level: 'off', 'medium', or 'high'. Accepts aliases: none/disabled (off), moderate (medium), strict/active (high).

fields.Name: SiteSearch
fields.Description: Restricts search to pages from a specific site or domain (e.g., 'github.com' or 'wikipedia.org').

fields.Name: SiteSearchFilter
fields.Description: Controls whether SiteSearch includes ('i' or 'include') or excludes ('e' or 'exclude') the specified site. Requires SiteSearch parameter.

fields.Name: LanguageRestriction
fields.Description: Restricts search to documents in a particular language. Use 2-letter code (e.g., 'en', 'es', 'fr') or 'lang_xx' format.

fields.Name: ExactTerms
fields.Description: Phrase that must appear exactly in the search results (equivalent to putting terms in quotes).

fields.Name: ExcludeTerms
fields.Description: Terms to exclude from search results (equivalent to using minus operator).

fields.Name: DateRestrict
fields.Description: Restricts results to documents published within a timeframe. Format: 'd[number]' (days), 'w[number]' (weeks), 'm[number]' (months), 'y[number]' (years). Example: 'm6' for last 6 months.

fields.Name: SearchType
fields.Description: Type of search to perform. Currently supports 'image' or 'images' for image search only.

fields.Name: FileType
fields.Description: Restricts results to files of a particular type (e.g., 'pdf', 'doc', 'xls', 'ppt').

fields.Name: Region
fields.Description: Geolocation of end user (2-letter country code, e.g., 'us', 'uk', 'de'). Boosts results from specified region.

fields.Name: SearchResultsDetails
fields.Description: Complete search result object including metadata, items, and search information.

fields.Name: Items
fields.Description: Array of search result items with title, link, snippet, and metadata.

fields.Name: ResultCount
fields.Description: Number of items returned in this response.

fields.Name: TotalResults
fields.Description: Estimated total number of results available (may be approximate).
Search completed successfully and returned results.
Query parameter is required but was not provided.
Google Custom Search API key not found in configuration. Set google.customSearch.apiKey in mj.config.cjs or GOOGLE_CUSTOM_SEARCH_API_KEY environment variable.
Google Custom Search engine identifier (CX) not found in configuration. Set google.customSearch.cx in mj.config.cjs or GOOGLE_CUSTOM_SEARCH_CX environment variable.
Google Custom Search API returned an empty response.
Google Custom Search quota exceeded or invalid credentials. Free tier allows 100 queries/day. Check your Google Cloud Console for quota limits.
Google Custom Search request was malformed. Check parameter formats (e.g., dateRestrict must be 'd[number]', 'w[number]', 'm[number]', or 'y[number]').
Google Custom Search API returned an error. Check the error message for details.
Failed to perform Google Custom Search due to an unexpected error.
